== dictionaries/rougail/00-base.yml

[,yaml]
----
version: '1.1'
condition: no    # a condition
var:
  description: a variable
  mandatory:
    jinja: |
      {% if _.condition == "yes" %}
      condition is yes
      {% endif %}
    description: only if rougail.condition has the value "yes"
----
